components.light

Class BlinnPhongDirectionalLightComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Component
      • components.light.BlinnPhongLightComponent
        • components.light.BlinnPhongDirectionalLightComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, BlinnPhongDirectionalLight, BlinnPhongLight, Invalidatable

    public class BlinnPhongDirectionalLightComponent
extends BlinnPhongLightComponent
implements BlinnPhongDirectionalLight
    Basic implementation of a directional light source.
    See Also:
    GameObject

      • BlinnPhongDirectionalLightComponent

        public BlinnPhongDirectionalLightComponent(@NotNull
                                           org.joml.Vector3f diffuse,
                                           @NotNull
                                           org.joml.Vector3f specular,
                                           @NotNull
                                           org.joml.Vector3f ambient)
        Initializes a new DirectionalLightComponent to the given values. All of the parameters's components must be min. 0.
        Parameters:
        diffuse - diffuse color
        specular - specular color
        ambient - ambient color
